title: Did you present this future French political image as a sponsor in Morocco?
subtitle: The Internet memez mistakenly used an irrelevant picture of a Moroccan girl to illustrate the extraordinary life story of Valod-Belxum survivors.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: A viral image of the former French Minister of Education, Najat Valod-Balkasm, is shown as a young girl in Morocco.
